name: I´m The Master-Mind
description:
Master Mind, Megalopolis most known villain, has lost a battle against his enemy, the oh-so-loved hero Captain Complex.

Master Mind fell into a state of coma after the battle, but thanks to his powerful brain, that allows him to move objects from afar, he is still conscious.

He heard he is going to jail when he wakes from the coma. Help him get out of the hospital by solving physics puzzles with your telekinetic abilities!
